title: Omega Squad Nunu
body: I think this skin would be amazing because nunu is the orginial OG of the jungle. He's seen alot of action in his days. He cant speak because he suffers from PTSD and the little boy on his back is his translator. He lives his life with no regrets. He is the bestest jg ever.

replies.body: I thought Nunu was the boy and Willump was the yeti.
Nunu is actually the yeti. For security purposes, Willump (The boy) had the lore falsified.
